alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 03 at 11:09PM CDT until August 05 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of central Illinois, including the following county, Shelby. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rainfall of 1 to 3 inches has occurred over the southeast half of the county Wednesday evening, with additional showers and thunderstorms expected through the night. This additional rain may enhance any ongoing flooding.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
